abstract: Federal officials say FBI agents have launched civil rights probe into guards' use of force at Jackson County Detention Center, county jail in Kansas City, Mo; will be focusing on four recent cases of possible abuse of inmates there.
lead_paragraph: Four recent cases of possible abuse of inmates by guards is the focus of a civil rights inquiry by the F.B.I.

headline.main: F.B.I. to Look at Guards at County Jail in Missouri
headline.print_headline: F.B.I. to Look at Guards at County Jail in Missouri

snippet: Four recent cases of possible abuse of inmates by guards is the focus of a civil rights inquiry by the F.B.I.
